jcr:root.localscene:
• Located just minutes from Wall Street, South Street Seaport, and the historic Finacial District
  • Easy walk to the ferry with access to Ellis Island, Staten Island, and the Statue of Liberty
  • Close to all major subway lines including the Green 4 and 5 express line
  • Just a short walk to museums, shopping and entertainment
jcr:root.name: 10 Hanover Sq
jcr:root.overview:
Perfectly located and featuring spacious apartments with tremendous amenities this community is located in the financial district in New York City.  Each luxury apartment features hardwood floors, European-style cabinets, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances while bathrooms offer soaking tubs with separate showers and granite tile.

For an additional cost residents can enjoy a 30,000 square foot fitness center complete with two story rock wall, therapy room, sauna, steam room, and spa-style locker rooms. This fabulous community also features a great room with large screen television and catering kitchen, and a rooftop deck perfect for sunbathing or just soaking in the view.
